org.epics.pvData.pv
Interface PVAuxInfo

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasePVAuxInfo
public interface PVAuxInfo

Auxiliary information for a field. Each item is stored as a PVScalar. A map (key,value) is provided for accessing the items where the key is a String.

Author:
mrk

Method Summary
